description:
This skill is a Basic Hindi language tutorial which helps the user to learn Hindi the faster and easier way. The skill has a set of all basic words and basic everyday conversational sentences in Hindi.
The skill starts with asking you the Hindi equivalent word or sentence for an Englishâ€‹ word or sentence, earning you a point for every correct answer. However, Alexa lets you know the right answer if your answer is wrong.
name: basic hindi tutor
